author: Hoàng Mạnh Giỏi
title: Work on Hanoi’s VND 173-billion park project hastened
text:
Work on Hanoi’s VND 173-billion park project hastened
Hanoi is speeding up a park project with a total investment of VND173 billion (USD7.06 million) in Long Bien District.
The project covers 57,752 square metres, including a park, a square and a balancing reservoir, a system of playgrounds and sports areas equipped with outdoor exercise equipment, walking paths, parking lots, flower gardens and fountains.
The lack of public and recreational spaces for residents has always been a burning issue in Hanoi.
The city plans to invest VND15.08 trillion (USD612 million) in upgrading 30 local parks in the 2024-2026 period. Of this sum, VND408 billion will be used to renovate Thong Nhat Park. Thu Le Park and Hanoi Botanical Garden will receive VND330 billion and VND149 billion, respectively.
The project covers 57,752 square metres, including a park, a square and a balancing reservoir, a system of playgrounds and sports areas equipped with outdoor exercise equipment, walking paths, parking lots, flower gardens and fountains.
Work on the project was started last year and is scheduled to be finished in 2026.
Many cranes and specialised vehicles have been mobilised for the project’s implementation, and some of its facilities are gradually taking shape.
Once completed, the project will provide more public spaces for people to relax.
The lack of public and recreational spaces for residents has always been a burning issue in Hanoi.
The city plans to invest VND15.08 trillion (USD612 million) in upgrading 30 local parks in the 2024-2026 period. Of this sum, VND408 billion will be used to renovate Thong Nhat Park. Thu Le Park and Hanoi Botanical Garden will receive VND330 billion and VND149 billion, respectively.

author: @cope
title: Corpus Christi, Jornada Eucarística más brillante que el sol - Santoral - COPE
text:
Lo más maravilloso de Dios es quedarse con nosotroa especialmente en el Sagrario. En este IX Domingo del Tiempo Ordinario, celebramos la precisamente la Solemnidad del Cuerpo y la Sangre de Cristo. Cuenta el Evangelio que el día antes de dar la vida por todos, el Señor Jesús, tomo el pan y lo dio a sus discípulos diciendo: “Tomad y comed. Esto es mi Cuerpo”. Después tomando el cáliz, lo pasó nuevamente a los discípulos y les dijo: “Tomad, bebed. Esta es mi Sangre". Os aseguro que no beberé más del fruto de la vid, hasta que lo beba con vosotros en el Reino del Padre”. Y también les encargó: “Haced esto en memoria Mía”. Así instituyó el Sacramento Eucarístico como Memorial. De modo que Cristo está presente todo entero en el Santísimo Sacramento del Altar, en todas sus partes y partículas, con su Cuerpo y con su sangre. Con su Alma y su Divinidad. Así lo profesamos como Dogma de Fe.Por eso, cada vez que coméis de este Pan y bebéis de este Cáliz, anunciáis la Muerte y Resurrección del Señor hasta que Él vuelva. Los orígenes se remontan al año 1124 en la Abadía belga de Cornillón. Allí la monja agustina Santa Juliana promueve un movimiento eucarístico que dará lugar a la Exposición del Santísimo. El obispo de esa Diócesis instaura una fiesta eucarística que tendrá su repercusión en toda la cristiandad. Por otro lado, es el caso de Orvieto en Italia, un sacerdote pone en duda la Presencia Real de Cristo en la Eucaristía y la Hostia Sagrada sangra empapando el Corporal. El Papa Clemente V impresionado por el hecho promulga en el Concilio de Viena el año 1311 un Decreto para difundir esta celebración. Juan XXII, instaura el Corpus Christi. Esta celebración se fijó para el jueves siguiente a la Trinidad y en España se trasladó desde 1989 al domingo posterior. "}
24H RELIGIÓN
España Mundo JMJ Vaticano Firmas Liturgia Cultura Revista Ecclesia Programas 10 min con Jesús Vivir la Fe
Santoral
SANTO 2 JUNIO
Corpus Christi, Jornada Eucarística más brillante que el sol Hoy es la Solemnidad del Corpus Christi. Por Redacción Religión
Jesús Luis Sacristán García Tiempo de lectura: 2’
1 jun. 2024 22:05Actualizado 10:19
Lo más maravilloso de Dios es quedarse con nosotroa especialmente en el Sagrario. En este IX Domingo del Tiempo Ordinario, celebramos la precisamente la Solemnidad del Cuerpo y la Sangre de Cristo. Cuenta el Evangelio que el día antes de dar la vida por todos, el Señor Jesús, tomo el pan y lo dio a sus discípulos diciendo: “Tomad y comed. Esto es mi Cuerpo”. Después tomando el cáliz, lo pasó nuevamente a los discípulos y les dijo: “Tomad, bebed. Esta es mi Sangre".
Os aseguro que no beberé más del fruto de la vid, hasta que lo beba con vosotros en el Reino del Padre”. Y también les encargó: “Haced esto en memoria Mía”. Así instituyó el Sacramento Eucarístico como Memorial. De modo que Cristo está presente todo entero en el Santísimo Sacramento del Altar, en todas sus partes y partículas, con su Cuerpo y con su sangre. Con su Alma y su Divinidad. Así lo profesamos como Dogma de Fe.
Por eso, cada vez que coméis de este Pan y bebéis de este Cáliz, anunciáis la Muerte y Resurrección del Señor hasta que Él vuelva. Los orígenes se remontan al año 1124 en la Abadía belga de Cornillón . Allí la monja agustina Santa Juliana promueve un movimiento eucarístico que dará lugar a la Exposición del Santísimo. El obispo de esa Diócesis instaura una fiesta eucarística que tendrá su repercusión en toda la cristiandad.
Por otro lado, es el caso de Orvieto en Italia, un sacerdote pone en duda la Presencia Real de Cristo en la Eucaristía y la Hostia Sagrada sangra empapando el Corporal. El Papa Clemente V impresionado por el hecho promulga en el Concilio de Viena el año 1311 un Decreto para difundir esta celebración. Juan XXII, instaura el Corpus Christi. Esta celebración se fijó para el jueves siguiente a la Trinidad y en España se trasladó desde 1989 al domingo posterior.
Lo último

author: archyworldyscom
title: Kenya Airport Strike Against Adani Group ‘Capture’
text:
Workers at Kenya’s main airport have gone on strike against a takeover bid by India’s Adani Group.
Hundreds of employees at Kenya’s largest airport have walked off the job in protest against a proposed takeover by India’s Adani Group.
Flights were grounded and passengers were left stranded due to a staff strike.
Workers at Nairobi’s Jomo Kenyatta International Airport (JKIA) began a protest at midnight on Tuesday that continued until Wednesday. The protesters rejected plans to lease it for 30 years to the Adani Group in exchange for investment.
The government said the build-and-operate agreement with the Indian group includes the refurbishment of JKIA and the construction of an additional runway and terminal.
The Kenya Airport Workers Union, which is leading the strike and is the largest union representing Kenyan aviation workers, said the deal would lead to job cuts and worsening working conditions.
Addressing airport workers, union leader Musa Nadima said the strike was ongoing, all shifts had been suspended and Adani must go.
Comments

author: Bloomberg
title: Mexico Is Battling 159 Active Wildfires
text: Mexico is fighting 159 active wildfires across the country amid the year’s second heat wave that has also put the nation’s power grid under stress. Mexico’s national weather service issued an alert that at least 12 states would experience temperatures higher than 45 C (113 F), with large swathes of the rest of the country expected to see temperatures higher than 30 C. The heat wave has increased demand for power, prompting the country’s grid operator to declare the system in a state of emergency on Thursday evening for the second time this week. That means the available power was below adequate levels. On Wednesday, operator Cenace also declared the system in a state of alert. Read More: Mexico Should Spend Billions on Water, Not Oil: JP Spinetto Mexico’s national forest commission (Conafor) said the wildfires spread across 75,474 hectares (186,500 acres). It also said that 30 of the fires were in protected natural areas. Mexico City and several other regions in the country have faced blackouts, Milenio reported Thursday. Some schools shut down due to high temperatures in areas such as San Luis Potosi, El Universal reported. Parts of the country have also been dealing with drought. The capital’s surrounding metropolis of about 20 million people has seen intermittent water supply in recent months due to lower rainfall than expected.

author: Jérémy Chatet
title: « C'est le pire des plans » : licenciements chez Lubrizol, une grève illimitée débute - Paris Normandie
text:
« C’est le pire des plans » : licenciements chez Lubrizol, une grève illimitée débute
La grève est de retour chez les salariés de Lubrizol. Et cette fois-ci, elle pourrait durer plus longtemps que celle
 d’une semaine en février dernier, qui faisait suite à l’annonce d’un vaste plan de restructuration des deux sites industriels de Seine-Maritime.
Jusqu’en mai ?
Les trois syndicats, CGT, CFDT et CFE-CGC ont lancé un appel à la grève illimitée sur l’ensemble des sites à partir du 27 mars 2025 12h. « On est partis sur une grève de deux jours (les 27 et 28 mars) à laquelle succédera une grève illimitée où la production sera à l’arrêt », précise Réginald Sauvalle, délégué syndical CFDT. L’objectif est de tenir la grève jusqu’à fin mai, date prévue de la signature du plan de sauvegarde de l’emploi.
Les syndicats dénoncent le comportement de la direction, alors que quatre réunions de négociations ont eu lieu en mars. « On n’a aucun document, pas d’organigramme futur, on nous donne des raisons économiques mais on n’a le coût de rien, dénonce Réginald Sauvalle. On sait par exemple que des postes à Rouen vont être transférés à Londres, ça va forcément coûter de l’argent. C’est juste effarent. » Selon lui, les syndicats n’ont toujours pas eu accès à la répartition des postes supprimés.
« C’est un PSE au plus bas »
Ils réclament également la mise en place d’un plan de départ volontaire et des « indemnités décentes » pour les salariés licenciés. « C’est le pire des plans, on part avec rien, juste le minimum légal, rien de plus, poursuit le syndicaliste. Tout le monde est énervé, c’est un PSE au plus bas. »
Le 6 février, l’entreprise Lubrizol, spécialiste des additifs pour carburants, a dévoilé les grandes lignes de
son plan de restructuration des deux sites de Rouen et d’Oudalle. Avec pour principale conséquence, un sabrage important dans les effectifs. 169 suppressions de postes dont 145 à Rouen, au sein d’une entreprise qui compte 665 salariés. L’ampleur du plan social a choqué par les salariés. L’entreprise, lors de cette annonce, s’était notamment justifiée par « la baisse que connaît le marché des additifs en Europe depuis dix et sa surcapacité de production ».
Poursuivez votre lecture sur ce(s) sujet(s) :

author: Faith Chandianya
title: Gospel Singer Reuben Kigame Cautions Kenyans Against Following Pastor Kanyari: "Run, Mute, Block" - Tuko.co.ke
text: Gospel Singer Reuben Kigame Cautions Kenyans Against Following Pastor Kanyari: "Run, Mute, Block" - Pastor Kanyari has been under scrutiny for some time due to his preachings, prompting criticism from various leaders - Singer Rueben Kigame has joined the critics of Kanyari, describing his preachings and claimed miracles as misleading - This comes after MCSK chair Ezekiel Mutua condemned the now infamous preacher for his teachings on TikTok PAY ATTENTION: Leave your feedback about TUKO.co.ke. Fill in [this short form](https://forms.gle/vjFMUWfZB4UH23uTA). Help us serve you better! [Gospel Singer](https://www.tuko.co.ke/383731-who-richest-gospel-singer-world-top-list.html) Rueben Kigame has joined a section of individuals who have cautioned Kenyans about following Pastor Victor Kanyari on his social media platforms. What has Kigame said about Kanyari? Kigame took to his social media platforms to caution Kenyans about following Kanyari. He advocated for Christians to wholly denounce Kanyari's ministry. PAY ATTENTION: Share your outstanding story with our editors! Please reach us through news@tuko.co.ke or WhatsApp: 0732482690. "Run! Mute! Block! Ignore! Avoid, and join me in condemning in the strongest terms possible the wayward and ungodly conduct, teaching, and practices of “Pastor” Victor Kanyari," he said. He asserted that Kanyari sets a negative example for both Christians and non-Christians, exploiting the [names](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/names/) of God, the Church, and Christ inappropriately. Why is Kigame asking people to avoid Kanyari? The gospel singer provided three key reasons for his request to Kenyans to disregard Pastor Kanyari. These reasons include: First, he alleged that Kanyari is not a pastor but a dangerous apostate who actively promotes indecent sexual allurements, particularly on social media platforms. Additionally, he alleged that ever since Kanyari joined [TikTok](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/tiktok/), he engages in speech and actions that promote obscenity, tarnishing the values of both the young and the elderly, all while invoking the names of God, Jesus, and the Church. Secondly, Kigame asserted that Kanyari misuses the names of God, Jesus, Church, and ministry. He further stated that the now infamous pastor has ridiculed evangelism and prayer, and in his reckless behavior, invoking the name of God while publicly seducing women. "On many TV broadcasts and, more recently, on TikTok, he will employ such phrases as, “God bless you”, “Mungu akubariki”, “Praise God”, “Ngai”, “Mwathani”, “Jesus”, etc. sarcastically and in jest." Finally, he accused Kanyari of deceiving followers into giving up their hard-earned money by claiming to perform miracles. He also urged the government to expedite his arrest for such conduct. Ezekiel Mutua slams Kanyari over online misconduct Earlier, Ezekiel Mutua, head of the Music Copyright Society of [Kenya](https://kiswahili.tuko.co.ke/tags/siasa-za-kenya/) (MCSK), had [condemned Pastor Victor Kanyari](https://www.tuko.co.ke/entertainment/celebrities/549445-ezekiel-mutua-slams-pastor-kanyari-online-misconduct-vows-stop-mockery-faith/) for his controversial behavior and remarks on TikTok. Kanyari has been noted for using inappropriate language while interacting with fans on the social media platform. Mutua contended that individuals like Kanyari, who have deviated from their roles as moral authorities, contribute to the moral decline among young people. Proofreading by Otukho Jackson, a multimedia journalist and copy editor at TUKO.co.ke Source: TUKO.co.ke

author: News Desk
title: Dangerously slow
text: Due to the snail’s pace of construction of a small bridge in Kota village in Swat, on the main GT Road, accidents are taking place every other day. During summer, many heavy trucks are on the roads, transporting different fruits from orchards in the Swat valley to the rest of the country. Such trucks have been involved in recent accidents, leading to several injuries and destroying the cargo the trucks are carrying. The highways authority is requested to make sure that the contractors speed up the construction of this bridge as it is located on a major artery of the Swat valley. author: Dylan Donnelly, news reporter
title: Harris takes aim at Putin alongside Zelenskyy - and makes 'surrender proposals' swipe at Trump - Manx Radio Motorsport
text: Kamala Harris has hit out at opponents making "proposals for surrender" in Ukraine - making a thinly veiled criticism of Donald Trump. The US vice president and Democratic candidate for president said some want Ukraine to strike peace with Russia by accepting neutrality and foregoing security relationships with other nations during a news conference with Volodymyr Zelenskyy. US election latest: Harris takes aim at Putin alongside Zelenskyy "Ukraine has stood up to Russia's aggression and today Kyiv stands free and strong. President Zelenskyy, I am clear," she said. "Putin started this war and he could end it tomorrow if he simply withdrew his troops from Ukraine's sovereign territory." Hinting at Mr Trump's recent comments saying Ukraine should have taken "a bad deal," Ms Harris added: "They are not proposals for peace. Instead, they are proposals for surrender. "The US can not and should not isolate ourselves from the rest of the world. Isolation is not insulation." Mr Trump has said he will meet with Mr Zelenskyy on Friday in a post on Truth Social. It comes a day after the former president suggested Ukraine should have made concessions to Russian President Vladimir Putin in the months before the war started. At a campaign rally in North Carolina, Mr Trump said: "The worst deal would've been better than what we have now. If they made a bad deal, it would've been much better. "They would've given up a little bit and everybody would be living and every building would be built, and every tower would be ageing for another 2,000 years." "What deal can we make? It's demolished," he added. "The people are dead. The country is in rubble." Mr Trump has also previously claimed he would end the war in Ukraine the same day he retakes office - but has also condemned Russia's invasion. Zelenskyy calls for more air defence Meanwhile, Mr Zelenskyy said Ukraine's air defences need to be "urgently strengthened" to "save thousands of lives and reduce Russian terror to zero". "We have to end this war, we need a just peace. We must protect our people: Ukrainian families, Ukrainian children and everyone from Putin's evil," he said at the White House. His appearance came after a meeting with Joe Biden, where the US president announced a "surge" in military support for Ukraine. The new package includes long-desired glide bombs, air defence kit, and more training for Ukrainian pilots, but it did not come with permission to use long-range missiles against targets inside Russia. Recent weeks have seen Mr Zelenskyy pushing the US and other Western allies for permission to use longer-range missile systems to strike deeper into Russia. So far the Pentagon and White House have not green-lit the loosening of restrictions. There has been hesitation amid concerns over an escalation, which Russia has warned of. With 40 days to go until the election, next for Ms Harris is a visit to a border entry facility in Douglas, Arizona. Sky's partner network NBC News reported she will receive "official briefings on operations and progress on disrupting the flow of fentanyl through the southern border," according to an official from her office. Meanwhile, Mr Trump is meeting with UK Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer at Trump Tower in New York. Speaking to journalists ahead of the meeting, Sir Keir reiterated he wanted to meet both Mr Trump and Ms Harris ahead of the November vote. (c) Sky News 2024: [Harris takes aim at Putin alongside Zelenskyy - and makes 'surrender proposals' swipe at Trump](https://news.sky.com/story/harris-takes-aim-at-putin-alongside-zelenskyy-and-makes-surrender-proposals-swipe-at-trump-13222630)

author: Kaktus Media
title: Отдых испорчен. Минпросвещения вызвало учителей на работу во время отпуска
text:
Отдых испорчен. Минпросвещения вызвало учителей на работу во время отпуска
Министерство просвещения вызвало учителей на работу в период их отпуска. Об этом на заседании Жогорку Кенеша 26 июня сообщила депутат Надира Нарматова.
По ее словам, в последние дни к ней поступают массовые жалобы и обращения от учителей со всех регионов страны.
"Как вы знаете, у учителей сейчас отпуск. Но Минпросвещения дало указание им завести электронные личные дела учеников. Классным руководителям, несмотря на отпуск, приходится выходить на работу. Это во-первых. Во-вторых, на местах возникают проблемы с интернетом. Учителя просят компенсировать им работу в отпускной период и доплатить за эти дни", - сказала депутат.
Она обратилась к торага Нурланбеку Тургунбек уулу с просьбой дать протокольное поручение по данному вопросу, а также к представителю кабмина в Жогорку Кенеше Алмасбеку Абытову и Министерству финансов принять меры и удовлетворить законные требования учителей.
Напомним, ранее Минпросвещения сообщило, что с нового учебного года в Кыргызстане личные дела школьников будут переведены в электронный формат.

author: Rahul M
title: 'Demolish Darul Uloom Deoband': Yati Narsinghanand Urges CM Yogi Adityanath For Bulldozer Action Over 'Ghazwa-E-Hind' Fatwa (Video)
text:
Ghaziabad, February 23: Hindutva leader Yati Narsinghanand Saraswati urged Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath to demolish Islamic seminary Darul Uloom Deoband with bulldozers over its fatwa about "Ghazwa-e-Hind". The controversial fatwa issued by Darul Uloom Deoband discusses the concept of "Ghazwa-e-Hind" and allegedly glorifies "martyrdom in the context of India's invasion".
Yati Narsinghanand termed the fatwa as an official call for killing of Hindus and requested CM Yogi Adityanath to take bulldozer action against Darul Uloom Deoband. "Through its fatwa, Darool Uloom has official announced Ghazwa-e-Hind. Mahant Digvijay Nath's grandson must understand the meaning of this fatwa. You are the Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh. We want you to become Prime Minister one day. They have called for killing of 100 crore Hindus," he said in a video message.
Calling Darul Uloom Deoband ideological centre of terrorism, Narsinghanand urged Adityanath to send bulldozers to demolish the Islamic seminary. "Send your bulldozers and raze Darul Uloom Deoband. Nothing would happen by demolishing properties of petty people," he added. He further called Hindus to demolish Darul Uloom Deoband if Hindu leaders fail to do their "job".
What Is Ghazwa-e-Hind?
Ghazwa-e-Hind is an Islamic eschatological term that refers to a future military expedition led by the Muslim Messiah against the non-Muslims of the Indian subcontinent. The term is derived from the Arabic words ghazwa, meaning "military expedition" or "raid", and Hind, referring to India.
It is important to note that not all Muslims believe in Ghazwa-e-Hind. A section of Islamic scholars argue that the hadiths that mention Ghazwa-e-Hind are not authentic, or that they should be interpreted metaphorically. Others argue that even if the hadiths are authentic, they do not justify violence against non-Muslims.
